name: UnmodifiableMapEntryTest
description: Tests for the UnmodifiableMapEntry class, focusing on its unmodifiable behavior and constructor functionalities.

methods.name: makeMapEntry
methods.signature: Map.Entry<K, V> makeMapEntry(K key, V value)

test_cases.name: testAccessorsAndMutators
test_cases.description: Tests the accessor methods (getKey and getValue) of the Map.Entry interface.

test_cases.name: testConstructors
test_cases.description: Tests the constructors of the UnmodifiableMapEntry class.

test_cases.name: testSelfReferenceHandling
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of self-references in the UnmodifiableMapEntry class.

test_cases.name: testUnmodifiable
test_cases.description: Tests the unmodifiable behavior of the UnmodifiableMapEntry class by attempting to set a value.
